headline: Why This 1 Growth Stock Could Be a Great Addition to Your Portfolio

headline: Stanley M. Bergman to Retire as Henry Schein’s Chief Executive Officer at the End of 2025
summary: MELVILLE, N.Y., July 15, 2025--Henry Schein, Inc. (Nasdaq: HSIC), the world’s largest provider of health care solutions to office-based dental and medical practitioners, announced today that Stanley M. Bergman will retire as Chief Executive Officer (CEO) at the end of the year after 45 years at the Company, including more than 35 years as CEO. Mr. Bergman will continue to lead Henry Schein in his current role until his retirement and will remain as Chairman thereafter. The Board is commencing a
